results.summary: Two men are injured in a stabbing in Birmingham leading to the arrest of a man and a woman.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/02d1f492-9738-7e40-9dec-8d46a3104ab3"><paragraph role="introduction">Two men have been injured in a stabbing in Birmingham.</paragraph><paragraph>Police were called to an address in Swancote Road in the Stechford area shortly after 07:00 BST.</paragraph><paragraph>A 30-year-old man sustained stab wounds to his back and another man, aged 20, received a slash wound to his face, the spokesman said.</paragraph><paragraph>Both are currently receiving treatment in hospital. A man and a woman have been arrested in connection with the incident.</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/02d1f492-9738-7e40-9dec-8d46a3104ab3"><paragraph>Two men have been injured in a stabbing in Birmingham.</paragraph><paragraph>Police were called to an address in Swancote Road in the Stechford area shortly after 07:00 BST.</paragraph><paragraph>A 30-year-old man sustained stab wounds to his back and another man, aged 20, received a slash wound to his face, the spokesman said.</paragraph><paragraph>Both are currently receiving treatment in hospital. A man and a woman have been arrested in connection with the incident.</paragraph></shortFormBody>
results.headline: Two held after men hurt in stabbing in Stechford
results.shortHeadline: Two held after men hurt in stabbing
